module.title: Modern JavaScript (ES6+)
module.description: Template literals, modules, optional chaining, and more

lessons.title: Template Literals & Tagged Templates
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Backticks: `` `Hello ${name}` ``
- Multi-line strings without `\n`
- Expression interpolation: `${expression}`
- Tagged templates for custom processing

---

lessons.title: ES Modules (import/export)
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `export` makes code available to other files
- `import` brings code from other files
- Named exports: `export { fn }` / `import { fn }`
- Default export: `export default fn` / `import fn`

---

# ES Modules

lessons.title: Optional Chaining & Nullish Coalescing
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `?.` safely accesses nested properties
- Returns `undefined` instead of throwing errors
- `??` returns right side only for `null`/`undefined`
- Combine them: `obj?.prop ?? 'default'`

---

# Optional Chaining & Nullish Coalescing

lessons.title: Spread & Rest Operators
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Spread `...` expands arrays/objects
- Rest `...` collects remaining elements
- Clone arrays: `[...arr]`
- Merge objects: `{ ...obj1, ...obj2 }`
